attributes.action: Reward frontline immigrant workers NHS/others with accelerated U.K. citizenship
attributes.additional_details: France has already done this - Health professionals, cleaning ladies, childcare workers, checkout staff: They all proved their commitment to the nation, and it is now the turn of the nation to take a step towards them (quote from French minister). We in the U.K. are hugely indebted to the immigrant workers who have worked long selfless hours through the pandemic.
attributes.background: The home ministry to invite residents helping with efforts against Covid-19 to apply for accelerated naturalisation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564791

If you want the Government to take a different action to that requested by the above petition you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
